  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/tests/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_multiply, quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_inverse, quaternion_magnitude, quaternion_normalize

class TestQuaternionOps(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_quaternion_multiply(self):
        q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
        expected = np.array([-60, 12, 30, 24])
        result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
        np.testing.assert_allclose(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_conjugate(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.array([1, -2, -3, -4])
        result = quaternion_conjugate(q)
        np.testing.assert_allclose(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_inverse(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.array([1/30, -2/30, -3/30, -4/30])
        result = quaternion_inverse(q)
        np.testing.assert_allclose(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_magnitude(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.sqrt(30)
        result = quaternion_magnitude(q)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_normalize(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.array([1/np.sqrt(30), 2/np.sqrt(30), 3/np.sqrt(30), 4/np.sqrt(30)])
        result = quaternion_normalize(q)
        np.testing.assert_allclose(result, expected)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()
"
  }
